name: liminfcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cxr), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cxr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(liminf ` c0)∈ ℝ*)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(liminf ` c0)∈ ℝ*)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cxr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(liminf ` c0)∈ ℝ*)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(liminf ` c0)∈ ℝ*)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: Closure of the inferior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
